name: Slide Magic
description:
You play as a witch who controls a flask with a magical decoction. He is able to move on his own wherever you want! Set the desired direction for the flask to fly and color everything around! You need to cover the entire floor with magic paint to pass the level!

Slide Magic - A game in the Top Down genre where the player controls a flask that flies in one chosen direction, coloring the floor behind it, all you need to do is paint the floor in the correct sequence, otherwise you risk getting stuck in the level, deprived of the opportunity to win .

Control:
WASD - walking

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Logic game
- Difficulty
